transcript.text: everyone I have a testimony I have such
a joyful testimony so as I was driving
home from UCLA this evening there had
been this house of Judaica house of
David Judaica store that was along the
way in in Burbank California that I'd
wanted to stop to stop that for a while
but I was never my schedule never
allowed because of my preaching and it's
a completely you know Orthodox Jewish
store and and when I finally got to stop
there this evening just before they
closed they you know they of course
filled with all these Talmud's but they
have also all these beautiful you know
Kaddish cups and then they have Hana
Kia's and I was really looking for like
another menorah but I was praying
because the the gentleman there he had
us keep on and and I was just praying
like how can I witness to him how can I
testify to him and I was wandering
through the store and then finally I
found I found this this beautiful
menorah and so I asked him I said is
this for sale and it looked like it was
real expensive and he said oh no no it's
not that expensive and he told me what
the price wasn't like oh I can buy that
so I bought it and as I was buying it I
started talking to him and asked him
about you know how long he'd been there
and he was telling about his family and
and he was actually not the owner but he
you know works for the owners anyway so
we got to talking for a little bit and I
still hadn't had a opportunity to talk
to him about Yahshua so I said I said
thank you for letting me buy this I said
why don't you check out my website
spirit and tour comm and he said wait
wait wait hold on
let me write it down so I said yeah
spirit and he writes it down and then
and AMD and Torah of course a lot of
people ask me how to spell tour by I
know you don't have to ask me that he
kind of laughs like no I don't so he
wrote it all down
I said yeah go ahead and check it out
he's like I will do it what's your name
I said Daniel he's like ah Daniel so I
walked out of the store with this
beautiful menorah and just pray for him
because I just I had this a sudden surge
of joy as I witnessed to him hallelujah
we'll get the Orthodox Jews to repent
and turn to Messiah Yahshua as well to
glorify Him to exalt him
praise and now I have this brand-new

beautiful hallelujah hallelujah
hallelujah
Shalom guys I'm just very joyful
we got a zoom prayer meeting tonight
nine o'clock every night Alleluia
Shalom guys bye
